ConnectionStrings.SybaseConnection: Data Source={{Data Source}}; port={{port}};database ={{database}}; uid={{uid}};pwd={{pwd}}; charset=iso_1;Min Pool Size=200;;Max Pool Size=5000
ConnectionStrings.SybScaf: Data Source=127.0.0.1; database =testing; uid=sa;pwd=; charset=iso_1;Min Pool Size=200;;Max Pool Size=5000; ConnectionIdleTimeout=60;
ConnectionStrings.SybScafold: Server=127.0.0.1:5000; Database =testing; User Id=sa;Password=; charset=iso_1;Min Pool Size=200;Max Pool Size=5000; ConnectionIdleTimeout=60;
